snippet: Ryan Hall, a favorite for Sunday’s Chicago Marathon, has been coaching himself since last fall, running his own way and at his own pace.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Hall, a favorite for Sunday’s Chicago Marathon, has been coaching himself since last fall, running his own way and at his own pace.

headline.main: Top American Marathoner’s Success Raises Question: Is a Coach Necessary?
headline.print_headline: Top American Marathoner’s Success Raises Question: Is a Coach Necessary?
headline.seo: Ryan Hall Sets Sights on Chicago Marathon Without a Coach
